name: Haindling
description: '''Haindling''' is a German band founded in 1983 by [[Hans-Jürgen Buchner]]. The band specializes in [[Bavaria]]n [[world music]], a mixture of different musical styles such as [[Pop music|pop]], [[Rock music|rock]], [[Folk music|folk]], [[Ambient music|ambient]], [[jazz]] and [[classical music]]. Most of the songs are written in [[Bavarian language]]. Haindling is famous for instrumentals and film scores composed by Buchner. The name of the band derives from the small village Haindling within the town of [[Geiselhöring]] in [[Lower Bavaria]].
